Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
trends: There has been one other sighting in Hat Creek
There were no other sightings in Hat Creek on or around January 1st 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsAt 6:36pm I was walking to the cabin-home I am occupying when i looked at a bright star to the North of me at about an 80 degree angle or so up from me. It appeared to move slowly at first which gave it the appearance pf hovering. I ran back to the house I was visiting, yelled out "UFO" but no one else came out to observe it. That house is about 102 ft or so from where i was at. I ran back but it seemed that it was still in the same spot but it started to move again, this time a little faster. I ran out to the front yard and observed the craft move towards the SETI compound but more to the south east of where I was standing. It started to pick up speed and shoot out between two stars part of a constellation and as I knew and expected it to do, it disappeared from sight. It was wonderful to see because I have moved and also to receive the messages they have been giving me since June of 2010 again.
Summary: Bright Star Like Craft with Two Points
